rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
T细胞可以完全预防人类病毒感染杜克大学-新加坡国立大学医学院和新加坡中央医院的科学家发现，T 细胞（可以消灭有害病原体的白细胞）可以完全预防病毒感染，而以前认为只有中和抗体才能达到这种程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/T-cells-can-completely-prevent-viral-infections-in- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/T-cells-can-completely-prevent-viral-infections-in- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dab9435f-3de4-46a9-b6f1-15da99f3c5a8 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 20:21:52 -0500 T cells can completely prevent viral infections in humans
探索盆底疾病女性的性健康挑战许多女性因骨盆底虚弱或受损而遇到问题。这些疾病在孕妇、刚分娩的妇女和更年期妇女中最常见。然而，盆底疾病会影响所有女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Exploring- Sex -health-challenges-in-women-with-pelvic-floor-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Exploring- Sex -health-challenges-in-women-with-pelvic-floor-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfa45295-220a-4498-bfc1-389e57ec0cb8 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 20:13:16 -0500 Exploring sexual health challenges in women with pelvic floor disorders
山火给洛杉矶医疗保健带来压力，医生和护士奋力前行迅速蔓延的野火将洛杉矶县大部分地区变成了熊熊地狱，不仅颠覆了数万名居民和企业主的生活，还给该地区的医院、诊所、急救人员和疗养院带来了压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Doctors-nurses-press-ahead-as-wildfires-strain-Los-Angelese28099-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Doctors-nurses-press-ahead-as-wildfires-strain-Los-Angelese28099-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b331f60d-f540-454a-b5ba-5bd3a5708757 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 13:16:18 -0500 Doctors, nurses press ahead as wildfires strain Los Angeles’ health care
青少年大脑成熟延迟与不健康饮食行为有关伦敦国王学院精神病学、心理学和神经科学研究所 (IoPPN) 领导的一项新研究显示，欧洲的一项研究显示，超过一半的 23 岁青少年表现出限制性、情绪化或不受控制的饮食行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Brain-maturation-delays-linked-to-unhealthy-eating-behaviors-in-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Brain-maturation-delays-linked-to-unhealthy-eating-behaviors-in-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db41a3a5-742d-466d-8594-bee2b7755cb2 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 12:25:20 -0500 Brain maturation delays linked to unhealthy eating behaviors in youth
尽管试验结果有希望，但艾滋病毒药物的获取仍然是一个重大挑战有前途的预防和治疗艾滋病毒的新药有可能改变对该疾病的反应。但国际艾滋病协会主席 Beatriz Grinsztejn 表示，将这些药物送到最需要的人手中至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/HIV-drug-access-remains-a-major-challenge-despite-promising-tri-results.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/HIV-drug-access-remains-a-major-challenge-despite-promising-tri-results.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7675708-b341-43ae-9a17-19c45ed72b04 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 12:04:45 -0500 HIV drug access remains a major challenge despite promising trial results
突破性显微镜技术揭示抗体如何靶向癌细胞在慢性淋巴细胞白血病等血癌中，免疫系统的 B 细胞会不受控制地繁殖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Breakthrough-microscopy-technique-reveals-how-antibodies-target-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Breakthrough-microscopy-technique-reveals-how-antibodies-target-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06d78ee1-a89e-4135-aaf0-c48049dec225 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 11:44:00 -0500 Breakthrough microscopy technique reveals how antibodies target cancer cells
机器学习揭示了为什么癌症试验在现实世界的患者中表现不佳TrialTranslator 使用机器学习来评估癌症 RCT 的普遍性，揭示高风险患者的生存差距并提高研究准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Machine-learning-reveals-why-cancer-trials-fall-short-in-real-world-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Machine-learning-reveals-why-cancer-trials-fall-short-in-real-world-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c07ee63a-98cb-4905-ad5d-144dc553b7ce Fri, 10 Jan 2025 08:14:00 -0500 Machine learning reveals why cancer trials fall short in real-world patients
大多数交换氨基酸的致病突变是通过使蛋白质不稳定来实现的研究表明，60% 的错义突变会破坏蛋白质的稳定性，将蛋白质折叠与遗传疾病（包括白内障和神经系统疾病）联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Most-disease-causing-mutations-that-swap-amino-acids-do-so-by-making- Proteins-less-stable.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Most-disease-causing-mutations-that-swap-amino-acids-do-so-by-making- Proteins-less-stable.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ca88f55-8cfe-4d3a-bcf5-459a8badb114 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 08:03:00 -0500 Most disease-causing mutations that swap amino acids do so by making proteins less stable
新生物材料可以重新定义大脑和中枢神经系统损伤的恢复一种新的电活性可移植材料可以帮助大脑和脊髓中的细胞再生，可以重新定义遭受改变生命的伤害或患有神经退行性疾病的患者的康复前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/New-biomaterial-could-redefine-recovery-from-brain-and-central-nervous-system-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/New-biomaterial-could-redefine-recovery-from-brain-and-central-nervous-system-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bbaf646-9bbd-470f-b88b-331ca66b92c1 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 07:33:00 -0500 New biomaterial could redefine recovery from brain and central nervous system injuries
分析强调老年人和男性 TBI 死亡率较高对美国死亡率数据的一项新分析揭示了创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 对老年人、男性和某些种族和族裔群体的不成比例的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Analysis-highlights-high-TBI-death-rates-among-older-adults-and-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Analysis-highlights-high-TBI-death-rates-among-older-adults-and-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f45e1f8e-fce7-434f-8d5a-189224960ead Fri, 10 Jan 2025 07:24:00 -0500 Analysis highlights high TBI death rates among older adults and men
